name: Mini Cars Puzzle
description:
It is often said that modern cities are optimized for as many cars as people. However, during working hours this can be refuted. You have to take on the role of a parking attendant and unload a busy parking lot

Mini Cars Puzzle is a 3D puzzle where you need to unload the parking lot occupied by cars and help each driver get out of the parking lot without harming other cars.

Game Features:
- Relaxing Game play
- Increasing Difficulty
- Developing logic
